mapper.select: select * from points where mno = #{mno} order by reg_at desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into points (mno,orno, earned, used, balance, reg_at) values (#{mno}, #{orno}, #{earned}, #{used}, #{balance}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(earned), 0) FROM points WHERE DATE_ADD(reg_at, INTERVAL 3 MONTH) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') AND LAST_DAY(CURDATE())
